#include<bits/stdc++.h>
int main()
{
    long long int t,k,mod,pow10,dig,resN;
    std::string res;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        mod=5;
        scanf("%lld",&k);
        if(k == 1)
        {
            printf("0\n");
            continue;
        }
        k--;
        while(mod<=k)
            mod=mod*5;
        mod=mod/5;
        //std::cout<<mod;
        res.clear();
        resN = 0;
        while(mod > 0)
        {
            //std::cout<<k<<"\n";
            dig = k / mod;
            if(dig == 0)
                //res.append("0");
                resN = resN * 10;
            else if(dig == 1)
                //res.append("2");
                resN = resN * 10 +2;
            else if(dig == 2)
                //res.append("4");
                resN = resN * 10 +4;
            else if(dig == 3)
                //res.append("6");
                resN = resN * 10 +6;
            else if(dig == 4)
                //res.append("8");
                resN = resN * 10 +8;
            k = k % mod;
            mod = mod /5 ;
        }
        std::cout<<resN<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
